validation.repeatPassword: A repeated password is different from a new password
validation.password: Password must be at least 10 characters long and contain a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, a number and a special character
validation.positive: This field must be greater than zero
validation.notNegative: This field shall not be less than 0
validation.lessThan: The value must be less than or equal to {_target_}
validation.slug: The link can only consist of lower case letters, numbers and dashes
validation.url: The value must be a valid URL
validation.lettersOnly: The value can only consist of letters and underscores (_)
validation.dateBefore: The end date must be before the start date
validation.priceRangesDuplicates: Price ranges shall not contain duplicate thresholds
validation.schemaCheckbox: A scheme cannot be both hidden and required
